dict.acceptation: 篮；一篮；（篮球运动的）篮；投篮得分；
把…装入篮内；把…丢入字纸篓里；

sent.orig: Oh, a basket case is someone who is really upset or nervous.
sent.trans: 你妈妈怎么啦？basketcase?Basket是篮子的意思，你妹妹快要毕业。

sent.orig: Products: bread basket, fruit basket, pet basket, picnic basket, basket, etc.
sent.trans: 主要产品：面包篮、水果篮、宠物篮、野餐篮、购物篮、汽车篮。

sent.orig: One Chicago organization that they work with is the farm city market basket Market Basket Program.
sent.trans: 芝加哥一个和他们合作的组织是城乡市场菜篮子工程。

sent.orig: Inspect basket hoisting rings frequently for rigns of rust; Replace basket if rings are heavily corroded.
sent.trans: 经常检查装置举升环是否有生锈；如果举升环被严重腐蚀了，得重新更换举升环。

sent.orig: Law enforcement officers on the spot inspection 9 basket and found 6 with rotten fruit basket.
sent.trans: 执法人员当场检查9个果篮，发现有6个果篮内有烂水果。
